text: Ixora johnsonii is a species of flowering plant in the family Rubiaceae. It is endemic to Ernakulam in the state of Kerala, India. ==Sources== * World Conservation Monitoring Centre 1998. Ixora johnsonii. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 22 August 2007. ==External links== *World Checklist of Rubiaceae johnsonii Category:Flora of Kerala Category:Critically endangered plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Ixora johnsonii
